images.AltText: Architectural cardboard model of a city space viewed from above. A large roundabout with a tall, narrow monument is surrounded by buildings, including a large building with rounded, circular features just opposite the monument.
images.AltTextTC: 鳥瞰市內空間的紙板建築模型。大型迴旋處中央矗立高聳的紀念碑，周圍都是建築物，紀念碑對面有一座設有圓形結構的大型建築物。
